alert.note: Alert for Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued August 12 at 1:41PM MST until August 12 at 2:45PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Dust Storm Warning for... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 245 PM MST. * At 141 PM MST, a wall of dust was along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Blackwater to 8 miles southeast of Coolidge Airport, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. * This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 191 and 204. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 176 and 178. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 124 and 142. Locations impacted include... Casa Grande, Florence, Coolidge, La Palma, Blackwater, Toltec, Arizola, Magma, San Tan Valley, Randolph, Coolidge Airport and Valley Farms. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
